description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Angle of Attack is a fast-paced, visually stunning, twin-stick "strategy" shooter. Deploy droids and defend your ship, all the while attempting to construct and connect multiple 'nodes'.
description.short: Angle of Attack is a fast-paced, visually stunning, twin-stick "strategy" shooter. Deploy droids and defend your ship, all the while attempting to construct and connect multiple 'nodes'.
